name: SurfExtrema
author: AFNI Developers
description: A program finding the local extrema in a dataset.

inputs.description: Input dataset in which Extrema are to be identified.
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: Neighborhood radius (R) in mm. Default is 8 mm.
inputs.name: Neighborhood Radius

inputs.description: Do not consider nodes with value less than this threshold. Default is 0.
inputs.name: Threshold

inputs.description: Do not consider nodes with gradient less than this threshold. Default is 0.01.
inputs.name: Gradient Threshold

inputs.description: Scaling to apply to gradient computation.
inputs.name: Gradient Scale

inputs.description: Find maxima, minima, or extrema. Options are MAX (default), MIN, ABS.
inputs.name: Extrema Type

inputs.description: Name of file in which to store a record of the extrema found.
inputs.name: Table File

output-files.description: Output file containing the scaled average gradient values.
output-files.name: Gradient Output File

output-files.description: Output file containing the nodes with maximum values.
output-files.name: Extrema Nodes Output File
